trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert double-precision, floating point number objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，將雙精度浮點數值的物件，與其他各種表示相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Double> object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換器只能轉換<xref:System.Double>物件與字串。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of DoubleConverter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立 DoubleConverter 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>中的範例

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別和[How to︰ 實作類型轉換器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DoubleConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DoubleConverter"></xref>類別。
